description:
Taiki and Shoutmon return to the Digital World to find it conquered by the Bagra Army. The Zones have disappeared and the world, under Bagramon`s reign, has been reformatted into seven Kingdoms ruled by seven Death Generals. Taiki and Shoutmon arrive in Dragon Land, a Kingdom full of the Bagra Army`s most powerful soldiers. But for some reason, when the enemy surrounds them, Shoutmon is unable to Digivolve to OmegaShoutmon. Then they witness the arrival of Kiriha, who has been seeking the Death General of this Kingdom, Dorbickmon...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arata Naru Sekai e! Hiretsu Shougun no Dragon Land
To a New World! The Fire-fury General`s Dragon Land
新たなる世界へ! 火烈将軍のドラゴンランド
